chef.bio: Marcus Means has a passion for healthy living and exercise. He has a certificate in plant-based nutrition from eCornell and loves nature. He also loves reading, good coffee and exploring new places.

recipes.name: Black bean recipes
recipes.description: This versatile storecupboard ingredient stars in top recipes including crowd-pleasing chilli, speedy tacos, sensational soups and much more.

recipes.name: Runner bean recipesi
recipes.description: Use up a summer glut or a bag of frozen runner beans in a wide range of pasta recipes, salads and side dishes, as well as aromatic curries.

recipes.name: Broad bean recipes
recipes.description: Pop these delicious bright beans from their pods and serve whole or crushed., dark chocolate and almonds

chef.bio: Rick Laughlin living in USA. Founder of Rick Food (@Rick.Food). The best place in the world is a kitchen, there you can get real magic!

recipes.name: Paella recipes
recipes.description: Serve up a fragrant paella to feed a crowd. This classic Spanish rice dish usually contains seafood, but we also have meat, veggie and mixed versions.

recipes.name: Healthy fish recipes
recipes.description: From lighter pies to makeover fish & chips, nothing's off the menu with our healthier fish dishes.

recipes.name: White fish with sesame noodles
recipes.description: Whip up this tasty seabass served with spinach, noodles and sesame seeds in just 20 minutes. It makes a great choice if you're looking for a speedy supper

chef.bio: Chef Justin Koslowsky is the Head Chef at USA, an rooftop restaurant in cosmopolitan Singapore. Milan-born and Naples-raised, He started his career at 18 and quickly rose through the ranks. He was awarded USA's Rising Chef in 2018 and is now leading the kitchen at the acclaimed USA.

recipes.name: Easy vegetarian chilli
recipes.description: Make one of our easy vegetarian recipes for a filling dinner the whole family will love. Try a vegetarian bolognese, colourful fajitas or hearty stew.

recipes.name: Sweet potato & peanut curry
recipes.description: Cook this tasty, budget-friendly vegan curry for an easy family dinner. With spinach and sweet potato, it boasts two of your five-a-day and it’s under 400 calories

recipes.name: Baked tomato, mozzarella & basil risotto
recipes.description: Imagine all the best bits of arancini – a golden, crunchy exterior; cheesy, oozing rice – in risotto form and you have this moreish baked tomato, mozzarella and basil risotto. It's deliciously comforting

chef.bio: Ahmad Kasdi Pic is a famous French Chef known for gaining three Michelin stars for her restaurant, Maison Pic, in southeast USA. He is the fourth male chef to win three Michelin stars, and was named the Best male Chef by The World's 50 Best Restaurants in 2015.

recipes.name: Easy tomato pasta
recipes.description: Make this simple tomato and cheese pasta dish for a delicious, filling and budget-friendly supper. It is a great way to use up storecupboard ingredients

recipes.name: Easy lentil curry
recipes.description: Our fast, cheap and healthy vegetarian lentil curry, is comforting and full of flavour. It's also low in fat and freezable for speedy midweek meals.

recipes.name: Kidney bean curry
recipes.description: A rescue recipe for when there's nothing in the fridge or when you fancy something cheap, this curry is delicious and filling. It's healthy and vegan-friendly, too.

chef.bio: Michael Allemeier is an American pastry chef. In 2017, he was named one of the ten best pastry chefs in America, and he subsequently won the 2018 Zest Award for Baking & Pastry Innovator after having been nominated for the 2017 award. Zagat has described him as a confection master

recipes.name: Vegetarian eggs recipes
recipes.description: Meat-free recipes for entertaining and more. Vegetables are the centre of these flavour-packed dishes, from vegetarian chilli and pies to salads and stews

recipes.name: Easy vegetarian recipes
recipes.description: Make one of our easy vegetarian recipes for a filling dinner the whole family will love. Try a vegetarian bolognese, colourful fajitas or hearty stew.

recipes.name: Vegetarian pasta recipes
recipes.description: From creamy cacio e pepe and lentil bolognese to veggie lasagne, our plant-based pasta dishes are sure to satisfy vegetarians and meat-eaters alike.

chef.bio: Jason Ludwig is a Sarajevo native who spent most of his life in Washington DC. At the request of his friends in the USA, in 2014 she created Balkan Lunch Box, a food website with traditional Balkan recipes.

recipes.name: Chicken & chorizo jambalaya
recipes.description: A healthy Cajun-inspired rice pot recipe that's bursting with spicy Spanish sausage, sweet peppers and tomatoes

recipes.name: Chicken pasta bake
recipes.description: Enjoy this gooey cheese and chicken pasta bake for the ultimate weekday family dinner. Serve straight from the dish with a dressed green salad

recipes.name: Masala spatchcock chicken
recipes.description: Welcome warmer spring and summer days with our masala spatchcock chicken cooked on the barbecue. It's ideal for an alternative Sunday lunch
